text: Loket () is a town in Sokolov District in the Karlovy Vary Region of the Czech Republic. About 3,100 people live there. The town is known for the Loket Castle, a 12th-century Gothic castle. == Twin towns == Loket is twinned with: * Illertissen, Germany == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in the Czech Republic Category:Karlovy Vary Region
title: Loket
